oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bioslurry: a supreme fertilizer. Positive effects of bioslurry on crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Warnars, Lavinia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
Composting and manuring
Feeding and growth
Crop health, quality, protection
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bioslurry is used to improve soil fertility, soil structure, and crop productivity and it can be an excellent fertilizer. However, not many farmers are familiar with the advantages of bioslurry. This article brings together the main findings of available research on bioslurry as well as information from the field in Hivos’ and SNV’s biodigester programmes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Warnars, Lavinia (2014) Bioslurry: a supreme fertilizer. Positive effects of bioslurry on crops. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
